data.name: Doodle God: 8-bit Mania Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains 5 great 8-bit tracks from Doodle God: 8-bit Mania in mp3 format.

Tracklist:
1. Sunrise.mp3
2. Energy.mp3
3. God_mode.mp3
4. Main_theme.mp3
5. Old_School.mp3

Files will appear in your Doodle God 8-bit Mania folder in the Steam Directory: Steam\steamapps\common\Doodle God 8-bit Mania

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
